    level="1"

>
[Hybrid Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=2770) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Mastery of your shapeshifting lets you combine the best features of your humanoid and spider forms. When using your [Change Shape](/Actions.aspx?ID=730) ability, you can assume a bipedal hybrid shape. This form gains all the benefits of your spider shape as well as the ability to use items and take [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) actions just as easily as your human shape.
name: Hybrid Shape
